FavoriteProduct.title: Favorite Product
FavoriteProduct.description: Represents a product that a user has favorited.

productId.description: The ID of the favorited product.

userId.description: The ID of the user who favorited the product.

addedAt.description: The timestamp when the product was favorited.

/users/{userId}/favorites/{favoriteId}.description: Stores the favorite products for each user.
